# Contributing Guidelines

Thank you for your interest in contributing to this repository!  
Please take a moment to review the guidelines below before submitting any issues or pull requests.

## Contribution Requirements

- All code, documentation, and commit messages must be written and reviewed **by humans**.
  - AI-generated, or AI-assisted content of any kind is not permitted.
  - Repeat offenders may be blocked from contributing.
- Ensure your contribution is your own original work.
- Be prepared to explain the reasoning behind your changes.
- Follow the coding style and conventions used in the project.
- Be respectful, collaborative, and constructive in all interactions.

By contributing, you agree that your work is licensed under the same [license](/LICENSE) as the rest of the project,  
and you certify that it is your original creation, free from third-party or AI-generated content.

## Submitting a Pull Request

1. Clearly describe the purpose and context of your contribution.
2. Verify that your submission does not include AI-generated material.
3. Be responsive to review feedback.

## Thank You ❤️

I appreciate your time and effort in helping improve this project,   
with real human creativity and expertise.
